extendedInfo.description: Exciting new side-scrolling arcade game featuring a little cow with many talents.Our little cow barely managed to survive the dangerous world of CowCannon. Nevertheless, there is no time to rest - an even greater challenge awaits!In this brand new side-scrolling arcade game the cow is trying to succeed once more. Only this time enemies are fighting back!Tap the screen to unfold a portable helicopter and fly over angry birds and other animals that get in your way.But be careful - the helicopter has a limited powersupply which can be drained quickly. Collect stars to recharge the battery and regain strength.Score points to reach the next level and unlock new enemies and exciting features:+ the unique Bubblifier places the cow in a bubble and protects it from enemy attacks+ cannons accelerate the cow greatly and enable it to travel over great distances in no time+ straw bales act as jumppads and help to save powerNo real cows were harmed during development of this game. However, their virtual counterparts had to endure much pain :-("Join the happy animal war now and let your mind relax for a while."- AppEggs http://www.appeggs.com/apps/com.cowcopter.lite,23061.htmlWe collect anonymous statistics using Google Analytics to make the game better and more enjoyable.Tags: cow, copter, cannon, cowcopter, cowcannon, arcade, game, side-scrolling, helicopter
